layout.helpvalue:
Tesy Heater Platform

This plugin will automatically discover all Tesy heaters linked to your Tesy Cloud account. Simply enter your credentials below and restart Homebridge.

How to find your User ID:

  1. Log in to Tesy Cloud
  2. Check the browser URL or use the API to retrieve your user ID
  3. Or run: curl 'https://ad.mytesy.com/rest/get-my-devices?userEmail=YOUR_EMAIL&userPass=YOUR_PASSWORD&lang=en'
